name: Offroad Monster Truck Desert Safari Hill Driving
name_original: Offroad Monster Truck Desert Safari Hill Driving
description:
Get ready for monster truck games that are free and full of real thrill rally drive. It's free for lifetime. No internet required!

Do you love monster truck off road games? Welcome to new off road monster truck driving Sim 3D. In this simulation game of 2017 you can drive real 4x4 luxury vehicles. Become a legend among the monster truck legends and start driving off-roads in the hilly desert areas. Experience a new monster truck driving on mountain and climb hills side steep 3d paths.

Experience the real off Road Mountain driving simulator game with smooth steering controls of Monster Trucks.


Gameplay
• Real steering mode
• Automatic Transmission
• 3 Uniques camera angles to drive the car,
• Most realistic Trucks dynamics( brakes, engine, acceleration, speed, etc)
• Climb up the hills and earn gold to unlock new challenging missions!
• Explore the breathtaking views of desert mountains
